I I I pushed the envelope with the blog
because um I uh I feel that it's nothing

out there, but I even put warnings up.
If you find this offensive, don't read

it purposely. Um, I feel that it's
almost like I'm acting in private and
then seeing what happens. Um, uh, it's

down the end of the day and, um, you

I'm posting pictures of my friends to
annoy
them, talking about Carl Pilkington and
and other weird headed people. Um, I I

bastions of self censorship, you know,
like standup, you know, um, the podcast,

broadcaster, you know, I've had um, a

won't, but who cares?
Who cares, you know? So, yeah.
